pages.text: On your way to the End you found a huge underground structure that looked like the fortress of a civilisation that lived far before you.$(br2)Although they seemed to have technology that allowed them to open a portal to another world, they definitely should have done something about their vermin problem.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Gets rid of Silverfish when breaking $(item)Infested Blocks$(), dropping double XP.$(br2)Max Level: 1$(br)Applicable to mining tools.$(br)Mutually exclusive with Resonance.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a $(item)common Book$() with Pest Control by surrounding your $(l:enchanting/enchanter)Enchanter$() with $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$() and the other required materials.
